subject: Re: METS Training Services- Website change request
preview: Hi Lana,  Yes, I had already removed them when I sent you the update a while ago. Apologies for any confusion.  Kind regards,

full_threads.body:
Hi Lana,

Yes, I had already removed them when I sent you the update a while ago. Apologies for any confusion.

Kind regards,
